name: Millville
description: Build a small village from the grounds up, meet and interact with its people and try to bring all different Villagers into your little town!

name: After Meeting
description: A man and a woman who live in the same apartment often meet each other when they take the elevator. How will the story develop when they have crashed on each other? This is a casual love decryption game, you need to find the rules. In the process of passing the game, you can discover the story.

name: Wizards of the West
description: A western / fantasy top down shooter with a loadout system.

name: Memory Note
description: People live, remember and forget. An endless circle. But I... I never forget.

name: Caterpillarnoid
description: Breaking bricks with physics, bombs, shooting and robot-enemies.

name: PetDrivr
description: Drive with your pet over the town, collecting pet snacks, and their favorite toys before reaching your destination. Get help from your friends to find the exact location of the toy in the cooperative mode, or challenge them to find out who can collect more snacks!

name: Vacuulus
description: In a small remote town, the decades-old legend of The Vacuum Man seems like nothing more than a silly hoax. But one messy, unruly young boy is about to learn the true horror that defined the legend. Experience playing as the boy, sneaking for your survival as the Vacuum Man tries to take you away.

name: Ultra Bushwick
description: An indie twin-stick shooter set in Bushwick, Brooklyn, made by one guy from Queens. Fight wave after wave of your gentrifying neighbors for the money you need to pay rent. Also, herd some cats for power-ups.

name: Corona Samurai
description: This is your chance to get personal revenge on the infamous virus. It's coming for your village in untold numbers, but with just your swords and shurikens, you'll show the world how it's really done.

name: BulletGarden
description: BulletGarden is a 2D vertical shooting gamewhere you explore a planet where the seeds you sow blossom into weapons.You can handle about 300 different types of weapons,each with its own unique characteristics.

name: Crazy Rabbit AntiLogic
description: Hey man. You need urgently to help the Rabbit to overcome all the obstacles and defeat the evil witch. Make him feel like a hero! You will have to pass through hard challenges, based on your skills: move adroitly, calculate fast, solve complex puzzles.

name: Understanding, the Game
description: 'Understanding, the game' it's a suspense/investigation horror indie game inspired in classic horror games! Full Game coming as soon we can! Help us grow the game!

name: The Last Surface
description: This is a short minimal,relaxed game

name: Leaper
description: Leaper is a pixel arcade side-scrolling platformer.

name: Connect-X
description: Connect-X is a 3D puzzle game for the mathematically inclined. Fill bubbles with numbers in a way that respects the relationships specified. Connect-X has 50 challenging levels of increasing difficulty for you to solve.

name: Digital Diamond Baseball V9
description: Digital Diamond Baseball is a flexible, transparent, and hyper-accurate computerized baseball simulator that allows gamers to play games, series, tournaments, and entire seasons, using players from any baseball season in history.

name: CLT
description: An abstract Rorschach-esque sex-themed tarot card game.

name: Intelligence Operation
description: Intelligence Operation is a War GameAs an Intelligence Operation, as an elite soldier in a highly trained special operations unit, your unique skills in the art of tracking, target detection, surveillance and firing accuracy will bring mission success.

name: Garrison: A Mercenary's Story
description: Garrison is a Mercenary, who is trying to find new hope after getting chased out of his born and raised country on another land.

name: Dangerous Chris
description: Dangerous Chris is a 2D Top Down game with elements of action, exploration, shooter and adventure. In the game, you are Chris, a bitter man who had his family destroyed by a Chinese mobster leader. Chris, then, finding no other solution, seeks revenge, punishing those who caused him pain.

name: Space Rats
description: Space Rats is a combat racing platformer where sci-fi animals compete in variable gravity environments. Race by using parkour, jetpacks, and powerups to win!

name: Finsterwald
description: “Finsterwald” is a survival horror adventure VR and 3D game, based on Dark Ages period European myths about Ancient Guardian of the Forests – Waldschrat. Observing the behavior of visitors, he watches over the peace and safety of trees, birds, animals, other fosterlings on the entrusted territory.

name: Ink Studio: Tattoo Artist Simulator
description: Ink Studio: Tattoo Artist Simulator is a simulation management game, where you step into the challenge of opening your own tattoo studio. Design. Tattoo. Upgrade.

name: Crimson Core
description: Crimson Core is a turn-based RPG with a choice-driven narrative. Each choice can push the game into a different path unlocking multiple endings.

name: Craft city
description: Sandbox game. Build, destroy, have fun. Create huge buildings. Create huge worlds. Several types of blocks are available: 1.brick 2.concrete 3.tree 4.metal

name: I'm Russia
description: Shoot’em up platformer inspired by Russia the beginning of the 90s and old retro games.

name: Alterium Shift
description: Join three heroes in training as they learn to master their individual strengths and harness the power of Alterium Essence. With their training nearly completed, Dolion, their teacher, prepares them for the most important mission they've faced yet.

name: Ink
description: Change the dim world, fill it with light. Each inky struggle improves your sight. "Sometimes words alone can't paint the whole picture." A VR game about depression.

name: Jumper Starman
description: A Difficult Game. Jumper Starman is a Classic Platform Game. A Pixel Art Game for the best players.

name: Hello Puppets! VR
description: Go on a horror-comedy adventure that turns your hand into a living, talking puppet named Scout. Years ago, a bad Sesame Street knock-off called “Mortimer’s Handeemen” was canceled and forgotten, but the puppets from the show have come to life. They’re pure evil and they have plans for you.

name: Animal Liberation Squad
description: A stealthy short tale about underground animal activism. Lead a team of activists, rescue animals, break expensive machinery, graffiti walls and celebrate with vegan food at the Twisted Almond.

name: Bottle Journey
description: it's a bottle, it can be very difficult! this game is very difficult, it is divided into several levels and each level will be more difficult and more difficult, but you can help overcome these difficulties!

name: Artha
description: Take the Control of your mysterious cards in the online PVP epic card battle!

name: Confined VR
description: Can you solve the deadly puzzle and escape confinement?!

name: Egregor Indoctrination
description: Egregor Indoctrination tells an intriguing story in an episodic and laconic manner, combining elements of Metroidvania and Visual Novel genres.

name: Consequence
description: Surely one change shouldn't change everything, right?

name: Dark War Online
description: Sci Fi RPG game the game was designed mainly as MMORPG where you drive your chosen robot, it can be manually or with the automated combat system ...

name: The Crow King
description: The Crow King is a 2D side-scrolling action-strategy with a unique Handmade style, where you have to explore and gather resources to improve your strength until you lead your army to victory.

name: Arc Defence
description: Arc defence is a game in genre classic top down 2d tower defense, But in difference of classic TD, enemies can fight back. Use towers upgrades and special abilities to stop waves. Be ready for epic battle and try to protect our lands!

name: Viking Chronicles: Tale of the lost Queen
description: Join the adventure! Help the brave Vikings save their Queen and bring down the evil Ruans. In this great time management game!

name: Desert Mystery
description: A hardcore tactical shooter, where your main mission is to eliminate any threat blocking your way and escape the enemy lines

name: STG Become on Immortal: Opening Chapter
description: STG Become on Immortal - Opening Chapter is a bullet screen shooting game, which integrates China immortal elements into bullet screen shooting. Rich bullet screen types and rich bullet screen effects may give you a different experience.

name: Minesweeper Match
description: Here is Minesweeper for Expert Players! Can play solo with AI, dual via INTERNET or on LOCAL.

name: BadBee
description: Race against the clock to the levels exit by crossing the vacant honeycomb sections and avoiding scatter guards. BadBee is an escape game that is full of surprises and extremely addictive.

name: Camp Canyonwood
description: Build and manage the summer camp of your dreams in Camp Canyonwood. A life sim about the great outdoors, childhood memories, and the things that go bump in the night.

name: Soobmarinno
description: Explore the depths of the ocean filled with dangerous inhabitants. Encounter monstrous creatures, collect the ancient gold, travel through this amazing lost world and find out its secrets.

name: Cybloc
description: This unique fast paced skill based 2D platform game will put your game play skills to the test. Your goal is simple but your time is limited. Come and compete for that top spot on the global leader-boards and be the best Cybloc player of this strange electrical realm.

name: Shape VS Shapes
description: Shape VS Shapes is a fast-paced arcade game. Blast your way through 50+timed levels or go for a high score in Endless Mode!

name: Burkov: Point of Contact
description: Burkov is a competative shooter set in fictional place on the border between Finland and Russia. In a turbulent world contractors work to secure classified intel from secret facilites and closed off areas. Lawless individuals seek riches by forming factions and fight to cease control over areas.

name: Growing Up
description: This is the story of your life. Experience the entire journey from toddler to adulthood. Go to schools, learn new things, meet new friends, and have wild adventures! Every choice you make will influence your future career, and decide who your romantic partner will be. Who will you become?

name: Beast Brigade
description: The new shooter from the team at Intrinsic Games, delivers an intense, cinematic action experience bringing monsters and modern combat together. Beast Brigade arms players with an arsenal of advanced and powerful weaponry, and a wide variety of monsters to assist them in battle.

name: Zakumba: Astraia
description: Zakumba: Astraia is an African action-adventure RPG set in the fictional city of Pyrophestus, featuring a young golem- building prodigy caught in a worker’s uprising. Along the way she meets a friend who introduces her to the perils of the larger world, and also gives her the strength to face them.

name: Down & Out
description: Get ready for a truly immersive experience of surviving on the city streets to prove yourself as the toughest and meanest! Fight, make money, and become the king of the streets in our all-new VR game, Down & Out!

name: PePiBo: Peregrino Pinata Bowling
description: The ancient evil Lava Dragon has awakened the Volcano of Maconda! It is time for you, young Peregrino, to save the island by challenging the Dragon to... a Piñata Bowling duel! Use your bowling skills and ingenuity to clear surprising piñata bowling puzzles!

name: Plot of the Druid: Nightwatch
description: Druid apprentice Jase isn’t quite ready for his final exams tomorrow, so he does what any self-respecting student would do: break into the dean’s office for something to give him a little boost. An adventure game with sarcastic British humor and classic, hand-drawn art.

name: Crazy Engineer
description: Build your own chain reaction machine without limitations, with various objects and as big as you want it to be.

name: Survive the Dark
description: Survive The Dark is a story-driven, physics-based first person simulator in a post-apocalyptic mountain overrun by zombies. Clinging to life, you find yourself in the mountain full of zombies. Your goal is to survive in the depths of a nightmarish environment using truly intuitive means to escape.

name: ZenFarm
description: Relax and farm in the perfect world inside of ZenFarm game. Zen is for finding inner piece and harmony during your hard days in this beautiful farming game. Find your ZEN during farming!

name: Chinese Sudoku
description: Chinese Sudoku is a special, innovative Sudoku game featuring over 300+ beautiful puzzles.

name: Space One
description: Space one has been postponed at this time.

name: River Attack
description: River Attack is a shootting up style game 2D, which combines harmoniously colored scenes with aerial shooting battle! Evolve your ship to defeat an alien invasion that has the technology to control human combat vehicles. Will you be able to defeat an army of ships to save your girl and the planet?!

name: Goner
description: Goner is a thrilling new take on survival / adventure genres, telling the story about a son that, following his missing mother's researchy, will get him to an unknown island... Stranded and alone, your rescue mission will turn quickly into a desperate fight for survival.

name: The Deepest
description: Explore the depths, gather materials, these caves must have an end. Beware of creatures and save materials, look for guiding lights.

name: Paper Jam!
description: If you love word games and VR, you'll love playing Paper Jam! Can you make enough words before the timer runs out? Can you solve anagrams to unlock the story of the robots in career mode? How about a quick game, just for the high score?

name: Distortion VR
description: The world of Distortion exists in a Cyberpunk mega city in the near future. It is a world where technology is being abused and the citizens are being controlled by thought from birth. What's real is uncertain.

name: Dead Hospital
description: Horror. The action takes place in a hospital where people are dying. You're the only survivor... in addition... you need to solve the mystery of the hospital, but be careful, because something unimaginable and very scary may be hiding around the corner.

name: Techlie
description: Techlie is a first-person shooter action game that progresses part by part, where you fight in another dimension as the scientist named "Aziz".

name: Little Brother's Turn
description: Relive the good old days of being forced to watch your sibling play YOUR games with this uber-frustrating, procedurally generated platformer.

name: Egypt Picross: Pharaoh's Riddles
description: Solve the secret of the pharaoh and find pyramids’ treasure in Pharaoh's Riddles! New egyptian riddles await you!

name: Rubble Bubble
description: Get ready to Rubble! Align 3+ colors to clear pieces.

name: Last Generation: Survival
description: Last Generation: Survival is a survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world where robots have conquered the world.

name: Isometric Nonogram
description: Isometric version of classic nonograms. 3 visible sides of the cube are not independent. They are making common rows and columns with each other and it brings a fresh new feeling to the famous game.

name: Rise of Zombies
description: Rise Of Zombies is a first person shooter action zombie killing game with endless rounds of increasing number and strength of the zombies you will face a strong monster that tries to kill you. you kill zombies to get score points to buy weapons. you are soldier trapped in an excavation site.

name: Space Probes
description: Space Probes is a Shoot Em Up (SHMUP) inspired by productions from the 90s released on SNES, MEGADRIVE, NEO-GEO, PC-ENGINE etc.

name: Snow Trail
description: Snow Trail is a puzzle game that revolves around pushing snow blocks in order to reach a goal. Snow blocks can be pushed into water to create bridges, placed on pressure plates to open certain areas and much more! With 100 levels and multiple mechanics, each level has its own tricks!

name: Input Out
description: Input Out is a Puzzle game where the player commands a circle to the goal by Inputting movement commands. Navigate your way through 100 levels filled with different threats and interesting obstacles. Can you Input your way Out?

name: Detour Bus
description: Snap together inconvenient road pieces to build ridiculously convoluted highways, and guide the dysfunctional Flowers family on a psychedelic road trip across post-infrastructure America.

name: Rogue Snow: Everwinter
description: Six months have passed since the Everwinter began, covering the world in a permanent frost. Now it is up to a lone scavenger to help his camp reach the equator, in hopes of escaping the harsh climate and the roaming monster snowmen known only as the Droves.

name: Wolf Territory
description: Wolf Territory is a survival adventure game. It's the story of Kyle and his friends who lost their way in the forest.

name: The Last Order: Dungeons
description: The world is headed for destruction. Olvelia and Olvelius (members of the last order) need your help. Only the three of you can prevent the coming catastrophe and change the fate of the world.

name: Holy Chick!
description: In a world where bloodthirsty chickens have taken over the planet, it’s hard to keep your cool. You find shelter in a suspicious camper trailer, but angry beaks are pecking at the windows outside. Time is running out. Can you figure out a way out of this predicament?

name: The Episodic
description: The Episodic is about an astronaut who came back to the earth and finds out that the earth is destroyed by a something big. The player needs to find out what caused this problem.

name: Tars
description: TARS's only aim is to pass the level without getting caught by their enemies. Help him in this adventure. Don't forget to get the Golds and Keys in the section.

name: Incarna: Raid
description: Incarna Studios presents R-AI-D, a single-player VR adventure/puzzle game. Your mission: to find and destroy the mysterious errors that are plaguing SENS, the AI that oversees Incarna’s entire interdimensional network.

name: Young Archaeologist
description: Our main character is a young archaeologist, our main task is to get to all the fossils

name: Laser Burst
description: Laser Burst is a logical puzzle game that requires you to methodically rotate and position double sided mirrors that direct lasers through a maze to pop balloons.

name: Gold Diggers
description: A Life Simulator game in The Age of Aquarius

name: Psychic Guardian Super Splendor
description: After being captured by a mysterious group, university student Nagisa Kujo hears a voice in her head telling her she needs to escape. She also discovers that when she presses a button on her belt, she becomes clad in combat gear. With her newfound power, Nagisa fights to stop evil.

name: planetarian: Snow Globe
description: Planetarian: Snow Globe is a kinetic novel based on a short light novel by the same name that occurs before the events of Planetarian: The Reverie of a Little Planet.

name: Mars Mission
description: The Mars Mission offers real companies and work processes for career orientation! Explore different professions and work processes and find your dream job! You can currently choose between 10 professions and simulate their work processes.

name: Fever: Fight the Fever
description: I am pleased to present you with the very first game from Zin Games LLC! FEVER will take you out of your usual routine and immerse you in the microscopic world of the body. Keep your wits sharp and your reflexes keen while you collect Cellular Residue from enemies to bolster your own forces.

name: Yabai Mantis VR
description: What if you suddenly encounter a mantis bigger than you one day? YABAI MANTIS VR is a battle simulation game that reproduces such a situation that everyone thinks through a VR experience. Use various weapons and your own movements to defeat the giant mantis that appears in front of you.

name: Frop
description: Join Frop as he adventures through mountains, dungeons, and many other places. What's happening in the Kingdom? What's this dark essence? This game will have you solving puzzles, learning spells, battling in a turn based manner, and crafting.

name: Spy Escape
description: This is an escape game where you work together with your partner. One will have to be the agent and the other the hacker, and together you will have to solve the problems to get out. One can't play this game solo, so you have to find a partner online if you want to escape the room.

name: Pistol Master!
description: As a new Pvt on camp Greenwood you will be tested to sharpen your skills as you quickly try to finish each trial. Good luck Pvt as you try your best to work as quickly as possible.

name: Airline Technician
description: Airline Technician is a game about the important job of Airport Line Technicians. Their responsibilities include coordinating ramp operations and aircraft movement via radio, fueling, towing aircraft, operating ground support equipment, reporting malfunctions and keeping the airport operational.

name: Combat Labs
description: No two rounds are the same. Memorise each weapon and master the movement in a fast-paced PS1-styled movement shooter in which you are pitted against an opponent of equal footing - except every round, the load-outs are randomised. Who will win? It only depends on your luck with your load-out.

name: Void Arena
description: VOID ARENA is a fast paced first person RPG with classic ARPG combat & loot Systems. Featuring a multiplayer game mode which uniquely combines PVE & PVP.

name: Orbit Outlaws
description: Orbit Outlaws is the definitive physics-based arena combat game. Use gravity to pull off impossible shots in competitive and casual multiplayer. Choose your gun, chassis, and pilot, then upgrade and optimize your loadout as you progress against rival pilots.

name: Love of Dragons
description: Why do dragons dream about red clouds?

name: The Schizophrenic Dynasty of Müller
description: In this visual novel you're a voice in schizophrenic heads of dynasty Müller. You pass from generation to generation and you control your schizophrenic, talking sometimes with him. The important thing is, you shouldn't let your schizophrenic die without offspring, otherwise you'll die with him.

name: A Shopping Trip to Eklan Tor
description: Explore a tiny monster town in VR and search for hidden objects.

name: Dungeon Warriors
description: Dungeon Warriors is a random dungeon barrage game that we use to polish our lives

name: Dicey Krime: Traveler of Time
description: After a long time of planning their attack, they are finally ready: Dicey and his group of friends have the mission to fight crime and injustice all over the world. With your help they will combat their enemies travelling to various cities in time.

name: Sorcerous
description: A sudden disappearance will set Apprentice Mage Andraste on the trail of a mystery that unfolds with arcane powers, monster battles and cunning puzzles in the best tradition of turn based RPGs.

name: The Cassir Simulator
description: This is a cashier simulator, you need to serve customers, check and scan products, take money and give change. With the money you earn, you can improve your housing, buy food and medicine. Try to survive in difficult living conditions.

name: Earth Warrior
description: Earth Warrior is an experience from blasting pollution to exploring beautiful terrains. Your choice. Tundra. Wildfire. Ocean.

name: Ant Force
description: Playing ant you will have an unbelievable fight with AI.

name: Facettes
description: Explore the story of Facettes as you play as a woman discovering her homosexuality and overcoming her identity crisis. This self-questioning protagonist channels her introspection in her RPG inspired fantasy world: Facettes.

name: My Mind Ghost
description: An interesting story about a little girl lost in a large mansion, her headaches make themselves felt, and the medicine that she took is scattered throughout the rooms, her sick mind has invented ghosts that live around.

name: Fluff Labs
description: Help Fluff labs conquer the world (of the snack industry) by mixing chemicals. In this first person logic puzzle game you need to figure out what colours to mix, seperate and react to finish each level. In each level you race against time to satisfy corporate to advance to the next stage.

name: The End of Dyeus
description: Go in a quest for Dyeus in a primitive and cryptic open world ! Face mysterious assailants in intense and fast paced sword fights, and survive against a carnivorous fauna. Will you uncover the truth about Dyeus?

name: End Reach
description: End Reach is a roguelike top-down shooter inspired by the brutal gore of Hotline Miami and the heart pounding action of Nuclear Throne.

name: Space Force Squadron
description: Space Force Squadron is a horizontal 2d shmup. Choose between 4 pilots with different spaceships and different attributes. Buy upgrades for ships using points earned in battles. This is arcade style game, meaning there is no possibility to save.

name: Gladiators Manager
description: Gladiators Manager puts you in the position of a lanista responsible for training and managing gladiators. Participating in brutal arena fights and cruel intrigues will grant you riches and glory in the ancient Roman Empire.

name: Blood Labs
description: This is a Rouge-like Shooter where you fight through procedurally generated rooms of mutants.

name: CipherPilot
description: Crash across 100+ levels divided into 10+ worlds, each world introducing it's own unique hazards and challenges. Daily, weekly and monthly playlists keeps the challenge fresh as you compete for the top spot.

name: Project G.A.E.A.
description: The gods gree left the world in ruins. Explore the vast islands left over by the overflown river Styx and uncover artifacts with the power of the gods to appease the river and enable passage to the dead.

name: Archons of Doom
description: Play as an Archon of Doom to conquer the entire universe in this fantasy horror strategy game.

name: Bouboum
description: Bouboum is a multiplayer bomber-hamster strategy game! Engage against other hamsters and various animals in explosive battles. Clear your way and your enemies in maze-like levels and be the last one to stay alive!

name: The Next Jianghu I
description: "The next Jianghu I" is a game that combines the jianghu, martial arts, collection, cultivation and war chess. You can experience the adventures and anecdotes in the Jianghu. Where do we not meet in life? Who are heroes? Next stop, Jianghu!

name: Schwerpunkt
description: Schwerpunkt is a World War 2 military simulation game. Take control of hundreds of units over a large frontline, making daring manoeuvres to push your enemy back. Fight in one of the scenarios given or make your own in the map maker.

name: The Passage of Time
description: Challenge the passage of time and try to survive in dark dungeons while fighting with their inhabitants. Create unique weapons, develop skills and explore caves. But be careful - time is running out ...

name: The Owl Quest
description: The Owl Quest is an unpretentious little pixel art point'n click adventure game that aims to immerse the player in the atmosphere of the first adventure games of the 80s and 90s.

name: Dancing In the Moonlight
description: "Dancing Under the Moon" is a single-player only 3d bullet-running action game. Enjoy the sensation of being overwhelmed by a barrage of bullets in 3d space.

name: Pnevmo-Capsula: Domiki
description:
The action of the steampunk game "Pnevmo-Capsula: Domiki" takes place in Russia of the 70s.

The game opens the door to the history of parallel Russian reality, where society and technologies developed along the path of cultivating harsh mechanics. All houses are connected by a system of tiny rails along which you have to move in the form of a steampunk tiny capsule.

Search and activation of the hidden mechanisms such as springs, telephones and various incandescent lamps, passing traps, portals, mechanical mail boxes and other quests will show you the way to the end of the level.

All the action takes place in the setting of the harsh communist future dominated by bulky analog electronics.

name: Gaggle Brains!
description: Gaggle Brains! is a short puzzle game with 16 levels and simple controls. Steer your crowd of procedurally animated, physics driven humans, past multiple hordes of zombies - try to get as many past the finish line as possible.

name: BlackChain
description: A classic single-player RTS set in a Solar System ruled by megacorporations. Journey from Mars all the way to Planet 9 and uncover the secrets of the BlackChain.

name: Marshall Mellow
description: Marshall Mellow is a game about jumping up blocks as they fall.

name: Denki Bounce
description: Denki Bounce is the worlds first trampoline-based "Bounce 'Em Up!" Blast, Reflect, Evade and Electrify your way to victory! A high-paced, addictive, VS battle-sport game with rich cartoon visuals awaits!

name: Heroes Must Diee
description: Tired of quest going, monster killing "Heroes" who keep raiding your house for household items. You build traps and hire minions to fight them off. Stop these Heroes from taking what is yours. TLDR: build a dungeon & be a dungeon master !

name: Uboat Commander
description: "U-boat Commander" is an upcoming strategy game in which players take a Wolfpack commander role in the Second World War. Their task is to plan, synchronize, and execute u-boat attacks on Allied convoys in the Atlantic Ocean.

name: Midnight Cipher
description: Welcome to Sol Tollere, a city rebuilding from the EMP detonation disaster, which crippled industrial technology everywhere. Communication between people is being controlled by mega-corporations, acting as the digital postal service. Apply today to earn a living delivering these precious messages!

name: Little Hats
description: Little Hats is an open-world survival game with RPG elements, in which you play as a Gnome. Set in a magical world, you will have to survive, build, and explore in order to discover the secrets of the forest and the many lands that lay beyond.

name: Dimension of Dreams
description: "Dimension of Dreams" is a unique strategy card game with rogue-like elements. You play an adventurer who embarks on an exhilarating journey through the dream world, where you engage in thrilling, fluid combat. Obtain and add cards strategically to your deck via exploration and upgrading existing cards.

name: VR Spaceship Battle
description: Try the classic spaceship arcade game in a 21st century VR headset.

name: 末路调色板
description: Survive seven days with a cursed painting. Rely on notes from past victims and manage to successfully paint her portrait. But be careful not to upset her, or you'll quickly find yourself dead! An assortment of terminal tableaus awaits you. Will you be the one to finally finish her?

name: Russian Prison Tattoo Simulator
description: Become a tattoo artist in Russian Prison. Get introduced to tattoo iconography and special meanings of Russian Prison tattoos

name: Fallen from the sky
description: Fallen from the sky - a casual game with adventure elements, executed in 2.5 D graphics, where you have to descend from heaven to earth. The game is attractive not for its visual component and gameplay variety, but for the philosophical thought underlying it.

name: Strike VR
description: A fast action arcade game revamped into Virtual Reality. Shoot with your weapon, dodge bullets with your body, deflect bullets with your swords, and launch missiles and ultimate skills!

name: A Comfortable Burden
description: A cute and colorful time management game yet intense! Discover the mental load as you play this otter couple taking care of their house and family in their daily life.

name: Ladder Box
description: Ladder Box is a 3D puzzle game. Navigate boxes with mesmerizing mechanics, utilize the unmovable boxes to make one of the moving ones reaches the only exit!

name: Shadow Lost
description: What dark and twisted things are happening in the strange town?

name: IronSurvival
description: Seven months after the Montereale epidemic south of the park, several survivors will have to face many obstacles that will have to defend themselves from various attacks by bandits and hordes of zombies

name: Dream Back
description: Dream back Dream back is an open-world sandbox development game with rich and colorful gameplay. In order to ensure absolute personalization, everyone is welcome to complain and feedback, and I will fix it as quickly as possible. Welcome to join the official QQ group: 619641228

name: Cubic Currency
description: Get dice, use abilities, make deals- then profit! Cubic Currency is a game all about trading dice for cash- chasing after an ever increasing rent payment week-after-week, and dealing with all the insanity the future has to offer! From aliens, to tech, to cultish corporate leaders!

name: Fury Knight
description: This game is a fantasy platformer presenting adventures of a little knight committed to get bad creatures out of the magic world with the help of a sword and magic.

name: Ultra Imposer
description: A sci-fi action shooter virtual reality game. Pilot the Ultra Imposer drone and eradicate the enemy army with your blasters or lock-on to multiple enemy targets to unleash a barrage of seeker missile destruction.

name: One Pixel
description: 2D platform game with minimalist pixel art graphics, create platforms and shoot a lot to defeat an army with more than 1,000 monsters. The game was made for people who like a challenge and don't mind dying several times.

name: Hyforge
description: Hyforge is a "roguelike", first-person fantasy rpg; a self-proclaimed "Elder-Rogue." On your quest to find the Hyforge, a device capable of creating and destroying all life, you will encounter Majik, Mystery, and LOOT. Also death... PERMA-DEATH.

name: Cavebound
description: Cavebound is a fun survival co-op/single player game! In Cavebound, the goal is to keep an underground mine up and running while avoiding a deadly monster. You can play by yourself or with up to 3 other players.

name: FBI Agent Simulator
description: You are an FBI agent. Look for the clues, follow the leads, investigate, interview the suspects and find a culprit. The fate of the victims and their families lies in your hands – can you meet the challenge?

name: Street Massacre
description: Street gangs fight among themselves in the middle of the city at night. Whoever manages to live will see the light of day!

name: Box Cat Bash
description: Cars are falling from the sky? Time to get smashing, Box Cat!

name: Death Taxi 3000
description: Retro arcade racer inspired by the MS-DOS era

name: Among Waifus
description: Months in space, in a starship full of waifus. The sci-fi dream of us all.

name: Relax Memory Game
description: Relax Memory Game-find a pair Game, more than 30 levels, with a choice of difficulty, a time limit that is added by guessing pairs and a limited number. The game develops your memory and attentiveness.

name: Geadows
description: Another bad dream? Another bad memory? Fight against your past, defeat hundreds of robots sent by GEA, the artificial intelligence that stole everything from you and condemn you to your present. Welcome to Geadows, a third person shooter roguelike. Do you accept the challenge?

name: Esper Uprising: Hearts of Crystal
description: Valterra's newly legalized esper hunts increase business opportunities for smugglers like yourself, but only if you compromise your morals and betray the espers in your crew first.

name: Fox's Holiday
description: Fox vacation is a lighthearted nostalgia game. In the game, the player arranges all the journey of the fox through the plan, and at the same time, we can find our lost childhood. 32 weeks to complete the content of the week. Let's have a good holiday!

name: HaberDashers
description: HaberDashers is a console-style arcade (kart) racer for the PC in which players control miniature humanoid inhabitants of an everyday home, racing past outsized household items and through rooms as they compete against human and AI opponents with both driving skills and item pick-ups.

name: I Want to Fly
description: This is the story of Evie Maine, a shy girl with a difficult past. Evie is just starting her first year of university away from home. At first she's worried about fitting in, but once she sees a glider flying high above, her priorities quickly change. My name is Evie, and I want to fly.

name: Gunjump Before Dinner
description: 2D precision platformer with tight and responsive controls. Gunjump your way through challenging obstacle course.

name: Car Parking Simulator VR
description: Car Parking Simulator is a fully interactive, realistic and immersive car parking experience. The game has one of the best vehicle physics simulations in VR.

name: Plecos Keep
description: A 2D platformer where you can harpoon oceanic enemies, explore and keep the ocean free from chaos.

name: Escape the Underground
description: At the bottom of a massive underground dump, a sentient pile of sludge is born. After finding a discarded book that shows photographs of the surface, they decide to make the journey upward to see the outside world.

name: Conquest of Elysium 5
description: Conquest of Elysium 5 is a quick turn based fantasy strategy game with a touch of rogue-like. The game is full of depth, details and monsters. There are also a huge number of factions, each with its own unique gameplay and magic rituals.

name: Pokoh
description: Pokoh is a sliding puzzle game inspired by good old classic Sokoban but with its own flavour and mechanics. Your beloved wife has been stolen from your hands and it's your duty to rescue Pokah and bring her home.

name: Freus
description: Freus is a 2D platform adventure game. You will complete your revenge with the abilities given by THE devil in impressive pieces adventures.

name: Mojica
description: "Only the keyboard is used in this game!" Beat looming enemies with your typing skill! Switch lanes and defeat enemies by typing letters. This is an all-new typing game with strategy and a thrill.

name: Until Sunset
description: There are three things all wise men fear: the sea in storm, a night with no moon, and the anger of a gentle man.

name: Dungeons & Cocks
description: The plot of the game is dedicated to the life story of Matthew Delaney, an elderly Bon vivant who was forced to leave his country, after it had been captured. He reaches the shores of the New World, but the unknown land does not welcome old Delaney as warmly as he planned...

name: Escape From Monsterland
description: A sci-fi survival game with an all non-human cast. The Player is Captain Buster Krabnoid who uses a variety of weapons to fight his way through numerous monsters in an attempt to ESCAPE FROM MONSTERLAND!

name: Cradle-18
description: You wake up on a deserted space station on the orbit of unknown planet. How did you come here? What happened with crew? What is happenning here? You have to find out. And also you have to survive here because the station is fraught with many dangers.

name: Mad Chess
description: Mermaids, Angels and Dragons join the classic game of Chess as 3 additional factions with their own units and abilities. Madness? No, this is Mad Chess!

name: Rekindle
description: Connect is a sokoban-like puzzle game which you need to connect bulbs to both positive and nagetive electrode by pushing conductor boxes.

name: Chinese Empire
description: Chinese Empire is an economic city-building strategy taking place in the picturesque areas of China. Create your own new empire that will go down in history!

name: Mastermine
description: Mastermine is a 3D, minesweeper inspired puzzle game - solve complex boards over a 3D Rubik's Cube-esque map.

name: Glitch Escape
description: A Surreal Puzzle-Platformer Adventure Game.

name: Catch the Stars
description: CATch the Stars is a minimalist puzzle with a pleasant and original soundtrack. Click on the right star, solve the puzzles and form constellations with a beautiful and relaxing environment. No score, no timer and no pressure.

name: My Retail Store
description: Ever wanted to run your retail store? Now you can! You play the role of an Artist who inherited a retail store. It is now your job to manage and handle day to day business of your store while pursuing your hobby of painting.

name: Partless Ron
description: Partless Ron is a 2d platformer with metroidvania elements, the player explores locations, looking for new improvements to pass levels that he could not pass before, solving riddles of intricate locations and looking for the right way out.

name: Askara
description: Askara is a rogue-like turn-based tactics game, you choose how long each run takes, from a half an hour, to a few days if you want to! Multiple layers of mechanics mesh together to ensure that every run will be unique. It is easy to pick up, but will take years to master.

name: 子非猫
description: Sin descripción

name: Truants
description: Scott Bowers has been mysteriously contacted by a young girl, who claims she's being forcibly treated for "video game addiction." Can he save the kids trapped in the behavioral center, and find out why he's being targeted by the dark forces who run it? Inspired by true events.

name: No Light
description: The objective of this game is to scare you, you will not wait, you will run ... A Guard against five demons.

name: Life of A Yandere Simp
description: Life of a Yandere Simp is a simulation game inside a university where you, a simp, have to find out who is interested in your love interest and eliminate them.

name: The Island
description: The Island a computer game with an open world and a first-person view in the genre of survival.

name: Rogue Explorer
description: Pixel Art Hack & Slash Roguelike Action! Do you dare to discover what awaits you deep in the abyss? Explore randomly generated dungeons in a roguelike action experience. Hack and slash enemies, acquire loot, and obtain enhancements to your existing equipment. Start your exploration now!

name: Breath of the Wasteland
description: Breath of the Wasteland is a light wasteland adventure indie game. You can drive a variety of cars with different styles and feel, equip them with different cannons to fight, experience the joy of fraudulent buying and selling, go questing, collect Easter eggs and explore whole wasteland.

name: OmniGrav
description: A gravity-bending 2D platformer where you are tasked with retrieving items from a hostile planet. In order to get around you must bend the laws of time and space by shifting the direction of gravity and reversing the flow of time.

name: Wulin Chess
description: This is an oriental fantasy game of turn-based strategy. On the basis of the traditional turn-based strategy game, it incorporates a more rational growth model, stronger role mechanisms, deeper strategic caps, and rich collection of growth elements.

name: Their Radiance
description: Their Radiance is an unconventional walking simulator about love.

name: 暴打萌鼠
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocket Bots
description: Wreck your rivals with a rocket launcher in a fast-paced FPS

name: Pixel Zombie Survival
description: In this game you are one of the last survivors on whole planet. Destroy as many Zombies as possible and do not let them capture the world. To avoid losing, use various types of weapons, upgrades and turrets that will help you survive a large number of rounds.

name: Dungeon of Eyden
description: Dungeon of Eyden is a hack & slash co-op game, with fun mechanics and simple, yet eye-catching graphics and an every time world it re-create itself.

name: CyberGrid: Tower defense
description: Tower defense is a Tower defense game containing HQ, Tower, and 3 building that generates resources. In order to build a building, you must have enough resources. Each building can generate different resources. You must protect the HQ from the Enemy

name: President's Sniper Shooting
description: President's car is being chased by militant's cars. You have limited time to shoot them all. You are the president's die-hard loyalist.

name: Block Me.
description: I am just a student testing steam. Do not expect much.

name: DotStrike
description: DotStrike is a 2D top-down shooter. The players are large dots with a tapered nose. Players are divided into two teams: red and blue. Fight both bots and real players on the local network or via the Internet!

name: Bloody Service
description: The conjoined twins were bullied and humiliated... Now justice will be served! BLOODY SERVICE is a dark, gory and violent coming-of-age slasher FMV Visual Novel with gruesome deaths and clever one-liners related to tennis. Game, set, machete!

name: Sun Warriors
description: SUN WARRIORS is a frantic, hardcore, cooperative, twin stick shooter. The Moon Goddess, Aysel, is invading our world with a horde of creatures from the dark. As a son of the Sun God Naol, use the power of light to blast all enemies and stop the corruption that is invading our land.

name: Maze Banquet
description: A nameless boy emerges from the darkness. His creator led him to the banquet with a letter: "Observe the guests and appoint one as the Maze King". Deprived of his voice, the boy heads to the Maze Banquet. He encounters the four creations at the entrance... from there a mysterious adventure unfolds!

name: Gravity Field
description: Gravity Field is a spatial-logic puzzle game with time inverted objects, with no top or bottom.

name: Roce's Journey
description: Roce's Journey is a game based on the Sokoban, with 20 different puzzles and 100 levels. Players need to understand the characteristics of each mechanism and interact to solve the puzzle.

name: Wonder Cave
description: The Wonder Cave. Inspired by tales of Aladdin, Ali Baba, and more, this magical adventure puts you on the trail of a certain magic lamp, taking you through a puzzling series of challenges in the process.

name: Eat'n Eaten
description: A tower defense but instead of towers you have a buzzing ecosystem of plants and creatures with needs : your organisms need to eat in order to evolve and survive! Try to maintain balance of the food chain until you annihilate the very last invader!

name: XpCade
description: Play virtual arcade machines, and program them using a new programming language. Go out explore, edit and play mission maps.

name: Pillow Simulator
description: Bored of sheep, flower and stone simulators? Do you want something really different? Meet the pillow simulator!

name: Puppy Adventure
description: Puppy Adventure - Top Down View game with role-playing elements and finding puzzles, you in the role of a knight clear the locations of opponents and move through the intricate forests of the kingdom in order to find all the pieces of the puzzle and put them together.

name: King of Sweets
description: King of Sweet is a first-person action game with strategy and farming elements. You have to take on the role of the young heir to the throne in the Kingdom of Sweets and return it to its former glory.

name: Seafarers
description: Set sail on your adventure to become the number one merchant in all the world! Trade, fight, or negotiate your way to the top in your own style!

name: Wings of Legends
description: Wings of Legend is the first person VR game. You are the dragon rider. Do you want to fly? Ride the dragon and fly! Start an exciting journey through a sharp cliffs, incredibly beautiful canyons and breathtaking views.

name: Shattering Obsidian
description: An RPG inspired by the classics, and based upon a series of published stories. A deep, character-driven adventure, in a Fantasy-Steampunk world of betrayal and intrigue.

name: Walthros: Renewal
description: Make some friends, eat some burgers, and unearth terrible secrets from the depths of space.

name: Waves of Death
description: Following the tragic mistake of military scientists, a new generation of a viral compound has spread through the city allowing the dead to come back to life... All the dead, but also the bloodthirsty Bosses. Jake has to cross the city to save his loved-ones.The countdown begins!

name: Robin Hood: Hail to the King
description: Welcome to Robin Hood's third incredible adventure! From its comical campaign to its hilarious bonus chapter, you will love guiding the legendary Robin Hood and his friends in this new time-management game.

name: Ricky Did Nothing Wrong
description: Have fun with little puzzles in this Point & Click game! But be careful with the choices you make...

name: Chillax VR
description: Go to different beautiful, relaxing and chill environments in Chillax VR. Take a break away from the real world and virtually by stepping into a land you only wished you could travel to. Become involved in the game and the environment where you not only play the game - but also become part of the game.

name: Immunity Tales
description: The tale of a group of immune cells around the body full of fights against several micro-organisms, challenges and puzzles will keep you glued to the screen until the end of the game.

name: Brushlings Pale Moon
description: Brushlings is built for PC and projected to be on the Nintendo Switch. You play as Gaia in a solo campaign to restore color to the world before it's lost for good. Use a variety of elemental abilities to solve puzzles and defeat enemies to save the world from becoming colorless forever.

name: 牝静的开端
description: Sin descripción

name: Kor
description: Explore an alien world, meet a variety of eccentric characters, unveil an unconventional story, and experience a combat system that blends turn-based strategy with skillful combo execution in this classically-inspired retro RPG adventure!

name: The Secret Blue Forest
description: A relaxing wordless low poly adventure. You play as an Ice Sorcerer whose magic has a connection to the Ice forest, you're the only one who doesn't seem to be warped by the Ice forests magic, this allows you to create slippery ice, shoot ice shards, double jump and move boxes at range.

name: Zombie Camping
description: Zombie Camping is a third person shooter based in a forest camping where zombies are coming in waves trying to kill you.

name: Sokoban Gianta
description: Classic box-pushing Sokoban puzzle game, with a mentally stimulating giant level.

name: Plague Breaker
description: Plague Breaker is a retro rogue-lite platformer with heavy RPG elements. Pick your class, create unique characters by multiclassing or create your own class with the class creator, all while exploring a procedurally generated castle filled with undead monsters and corrupted plague doctors.

name: Retexo Mori
description: Retexo Mori is a Pac-Man-like game in first person, with bullet hell elements and an aesthetic that clashes early 90's FPS pixel-art with vaporwave.

name: Apocalyptic World
description: The virus has spread to the entire planet, all people have turned into zombies.

name: Help me please
description: You can't negotiate with zombies, you can't bribe or promise something in return, they will slowly but surely follow you wherever you go to destroy you. It's impossible to hide from zombies, they always sense where you're hiding. The only way to escape is to destroy them first.

name: Maritime Calling
description: Maritime Calling is a narrative-driven RPG in which you lead a daring expedition into the New World. Survive the life at sea, assign sailors to various jobs, fight naval battles, lead island expeditions and break the Empire's hold over the New World in an enchanting seafaring adventure.

name: Carrot Heart
description: The game is a co-op rogue-like with a variety of enemies that require wise choice of weapons and different tactical solutions.

name: Don't Blink
description: DON'T BLINK is a Virtual Reality horror game where you escape an from an INFINITE basement. Run from a creature that CAN'T MOVE WHILE YOU WATCH. The creatures only move when you can't see, so keep a close eye and DON'T BLINK.

name: Spellbound : The Magic Within
description: Spellbound: The Magic Within is a choose your own adventure style visual novel. Jump into a world of Magic, Witchcraft and Mystery as a magician in training. Interact with a host of unusual characters. Choose from multiple schools of magic, bond with your tutor, and maybe even save the world.

name: Oplitak
description: Oplitak is a game that combines various game mechanics such as 2D platforms and 2D shooters. The combination of cartoon-style graphics, dynamic gameplay and easter eggs make the game attractive to both young and old school gamers.

name: Kosmonavtes: Escape Reality
description: A Room Escape and puzzle / adventure game! Help Vala fulfil her dream and become an astronaut!

name: OverDrift Festival
description: Become the star on festival of car culture and sports. Drift, sprint and circuit racing. Huge game world, iconic tracks. Unique collection of cars. Wide range of tuning and styling options. Accurate physics: a sense of speed and lateral g-forces.

name: My City and Army
description: Strategy game of building war

name: Pit of Ascension
description: Jump, dodge, and shoot your way through a series of bosses to become the champion of the pit in this bossfight roguelike!

name: Yuha's Nightmares
description: This is a simulation game about the nightmares that our main character Yuha suffers from. You will explore the surrealistic world that is full of unexpected events. The deeper part of Yuha's consciousness is depicted through the flip side of the 3D world.

name: Shank the Cop
description: A multiplayer mind game. Cops have to decide who is a threat and who is not. Decide who is your opponent and shoot them down, or play as the criminal and shank the cop!

name: Cytoclash
description: Cytoclash is an action-packed lightgun-style shooter that calls upon you as Earth's best hope against a monstrous alien invasion! Suit-up and blast your way through hordes of enemies and massive bosses in the debut release from Setrino Software!

name: 古龙传说
description: 一款电脑、安卓、苹果iOS三端互通的武侠回合制网络游戏。

name: CloseCall
description: An explosive racing fantasy.

name: The Deepening: Eco-Offensive
description: Follow along with Kyle, and experience the events prior to those of The Deepening book series from a neo-retro 2D perspective when you run, jump, and shoot through waves of beasts to make our trek to the stars more safe.

name: Dropshipping Simulator
description: Dropshipping Simulator, sell to customers by buying products cheaply! Earn money by making smart cyrptocoin investments! Decorate your house any way you want! and eat a good meal!

name: Pour There
description: Logic game (puzzle) - collect bonuses in the form of yellow ducks. Use bombs and rockets to make passages. You will need to think about it.

name: Alexei Run
description: AlexeiRun - Runner, where you have to go around many obstacles, running away from HIM. Collect discs and buy upgrades to go all the way, unlocking new levels and difficulties. After this game, your reaction and manual dexterity will increase dramatically.

name: Star Aegis
description: Star Aegis is an old school, wave-based arcade shmup without shooting. Choose which side of the ship to protect with your shields and reflect the enemies bullets back at them or just ram them down with your shield.

name: Ouija
description: A top down exploration horror/adventure game where you use a spirit board to find clues, fulfil last wishes of the departed, learn secrets, and hopefully track down a serial killer before they find you.

name: Jump Kingdom
description: You are a "no power" protagonist, you can only avoid the enemy, including BOSS battles, the game has a rich BGM.

name: Quarantine Run
description: Quarantine Run is an cinematic story based, endless runner game with multiplayer, where you try to survive the pandemic by running and keeping up to date with the interesting news via Pandemi Radio. The multiplayer game mode is currently a beta, your support will help in the completion of this Game.

name: The Flawless Cup
description: An urban fantasy platformer-adventure with a branching narrative, The Flawless Cup reacts to the choices you make on your quest for caffeine. Featuring a cast of caffeine starved characters and hand-crafted narrative that changes with you!

name: No Sushi, No Life
description: You’ve arrived at a robot sushi bar with one goal in mind… To eat all the sushi you can. Grab all the sushi coming your way and stuff them in your mouth! Test your reflexes as more and more plates of sushi rush toward you!

name: GOC Royale
description: GOC Royale is a massively multiplayer card game that takes you to randomly generated islands to take part in battles to the death.

name: Heart of Mithras
description: Lead the combat team of your district to the top of the ladder, in the epic battle game of the megacity Mithras. Play a detailed management game. Recruit new soldiers, hire trainers to help your team to develop, build up your new base and play epic tactical battles in a complex simulation.

name: Training Lab
description: A laboratory simulator to do virtual experiments in a simulated laboratory for training

name: StrayDoll Conflict
description: This is a side-view tactics game.

name: Cyber Factories
description: Cyber Factories is an Automation and Base Building game in a cyberpunk universe. You lead a small colony of human remnants. Help them to survive, expand and gather enough resources to leave Earth for their new home planet.

name: Cards & Crystals
description: Match3 meets Trading Card Game! Collect cards, level up your heroes, and build decks to defeat your foes in this fast-paced puzzle/strategy game.

name: Yolo Space Hacker
description: Welcome to our ethical hacker's organisation: we will teach you how to use actual hacker tools (terminal, proxy, reverse shells...) to scan the network, crack passwords, bypass server security and solve the mystery of the Bikini-72 space station.

name: Monsterwolf
description: This is a turn-based SRPG game with a game duration of about 2 hours. You can use the characteristics of each character in the game to use different tactics to defeat the enemy.

name: ThrustWorks
description: ThrustWorks is jetpack flying combat game with enemy turrets, coin collecting, and vivid views in 4 unique levels. PC and VR support included.

name: Rounded
description: Unique ، quite a challenging puzzle game. An experience with wonderful views.

name: Wayfarers: Call of Osiris
description: Jack and Leila Dawes explore real Egyptian pyramids and temples and delve into their mythical underworlds to free themselves from an ancient curse. The extensive traversing and fighting may take a toll on their bodies, but even greater is the burden of the dark calamity tearing at their souls...

name: Hoplichess
description: A turn-based strategy game set in ancient Greece. Lead your very own Greek forces to victory in this simple but endearing game of ingenuity and tactics. Master the command of your troops, dominate the field, and prove your mettle as a general.

name: Super Neat Cat
description: A retro style simple platforming adventure! A small cute cat must save their world from an ancient Nanobot Virus. Explore a beautiful pixel art land as you try and find the source of this destruction.

name: Cyber Noah
description: Classic arcade game, improved by role-playing model and integrated into the story. A fascinating interactive narrative about the formation of A.I. Decisions affect the gameplay, reveal the game mechanics and lead to one of the 16 main endings.

name: The Witch in the Forest
description: A young woman who lives alone in the forest one day meets another woman- a real witch!

name: Let Me Out
description: Play as Alvin, a 10-year-old indigo child, in search of his mother and escape Mata Koetjhing, an ancient Javanese village. Get help from your little sister’s spirit, your pet spider and brew potions to exorcize mysterious creatures.

name: Nekopter
description: Sin descripción

name: Astralis
description: Priviet to Astralis ! In this short game, you play as Lieutenant Alekseï Ivanov, a soldier awaken from his cryo-sleep to face a terrible threat happening in the soviet spaceship "Astralis" lost in an unkown part of the universe. Astralis is FPS horror sci-fi game with retro graphics and sounds.

name: Codename Prodigy
description: A mix between 2D traditional and platform fighting games. Codename Prodigy focuses on allowing the player to use the stage against their opponent with unique stage hazards, health-stealing floors, and destructible walls.

name: She Doesn't Walk
description: She's following you, but your fear keeps you from looking back. You must focus on the path ahead to escape the forest in this Survival-Horror, or risk exploring to find closure.

name: Destructive Contraptions
description: Destructive Contraptions is a physics based sandbox simulator where you can create huge contraptions with dominos, balls, canons, pivot etc. and watch them fall apart and destroy giant structures, cities, buildings without having to worry about the legal and life threatening issues.

name: Glitch Assassin
description: Glitch Assassin is a Sci-Fi VR shooter which puts the player in the shoes of an assassin tasked with maintaining order in a simulated world. Complete various missions eliminating threats to the AI's directive of saving the planet from extinction...

name: The Shooting Maguro
description: You are a MAGURO and have to swim through six stages with perfect control and the fastest speed in the world. Let's blow away anyone who gets in the way with a MAGURO bullet. There is no remaining-lives system in this game.However, you will be called a "sluggard" if you do too much continuation.

name: Reginald's Death Arena
description: 4 player chaotic single screen battle arena, with multiple game modes, items, and quirky mechanics. Regurgitate what you eat onto opponents with various status effects depending on what you consumed. Burn it all to the ground!

name: Defense Grid: The Awakening - Resurgence Map Pack 3
description: This third (of four) map pack in the Resurgence series features new maps, new strategies, new experiences, and new achievements from the creators of Defense Grid.

name: Dungeon Dan
description: Open world role playing game where you control a schoolboy who must save his village and make mom proud.

name: Birthright
description: Try to rise for power in a medieval sandbox world. Where Lords and Families battle each other for the utlimate power. Become your own Lord, Merchant or Adventurer getting entangled in the lands history.

name: The Menacing
description: The Menacing is a 1-4 player online co-op survival where you and your friends explore different environments and work together to survive. Search for key objectives in order to escape and complete challenges to earn new unlocks, all whilst avoiding the bloodthirsty threats and other dangers.

name: Transfer of Essence
description: A fantasy tactical rpg /dungeon crawler where you decide how to spend action points to proceed. Play through each character's experience of the events to find out the mystery behind what happened.

name: Yuri Ogibalov's Bizarre Adventure
description: Yuri Ogibalov's Bizarre Adventure is top-down action rpg, focused on exploration, characters and fights. Explore the dangerous and not so friendly environment of the russian province. Fight enemies in turn based battle system with tons different weapons and items.

name: Albatross Koukairoku
description: Aboard the Albatross is an odd captain and an equally crazy crew. With no map in hand, they sail to unknown islands, meet ghost ships and cross paths with giant monster fish. No one knows where they are heading… including the captain. But they still all stay together since there’s no other place for them.

name: Russian Anime
description: What should anime look like in Russia? The only way. Your task is to prove that your style is the best in the area.

name: Artifact Hunter
description: Challenging adventurous match-3 game! Help Jason find valuable artifacts and save his father!

name: TechnoRunner
description: An indie Arcade Game mixing Rythm Game and Endless Runner, based on techno music with procedural generation. How fast can you go? How high can you score? Find out now!

name: Mystical Mayhem
description: You are Bob Mayhem, a streamer. You just had the revelation that in order to capture the attention of the world towards your streams, you would have to do something so outrageously stupid, brave and unthinkable that no other streamer in the world would have dared to do, ghost hunting.

name: Chibi Horror: The School
description: Chibi Horror: The School is a japanese and anime themed horror game inspired by horror games like Slender, Amnesia, among others.

name: Shields of Loyalty
description: Experience tactically challenging turn-based strategy in the hostile island world of Mantaria. Command a dynamic army of various unit types and classes to slay a dark and possessed undead army. Train forces into powerful warriors and fight fervently until the snake's head is at your feet!

name: Jumps VR
description: Enter a world of sky islands and jump your way to the finish, now in absurdly fast VR!

name: Doomsday Hero
description: This is a zombie shooting game, shooting zombies can help you relieve pressure, bring happiness.

name: Save 2020
description: Help a fellow archer overcome these big and mean monsters that are ahead. A Run and Gun challenging game with a variety of monsters and creatures, o and also bad people.

name: Raige
description: A PSX-inspired, narrative-driven experience, Raige is a disturbing and confronting encounter with a grim world, its inhabitants, and yourself. Become one with Raige and the never-ending ride of morbid fascination. You can always stop, if you want.

name: Road Home
description: Road Home is a classic 2D platformer where you tries to overcome dangers and collect treasures. Combine speed, accurate jumps and different items capabilities to evade traps and enemies and find hidden places.

name: Joyspring
description: Ascend the peak in search of the Joyspring. Explore every cavern and cave, crevasse and chasm. Hear the wind sing. Keep dashing and find the spring. And when you return, return smiling.

name: Sweet Home Puzzle
description: Absolute fan or simple puzzle enthusiast? Sweet Home Puzzle will satisfy you! Choose your puzzle from more than 100 images, choose your music and play relaxed like at home.

name: Sukakko
description: The new strategy wargame, in a retro Japanese atmosphere. Choose secretly your own army at the start of the game, and use your well-trained tactics to defeat your opponent!

name: Ghosty
description: Ghosty is a lighthearted top-down action-adventure RPG that features tons of puns, witty dialogue, charming story elements, and a pixelized art style. The game experiments with a splash of unique mechanics that are used both in and out of combat.

name: Racing Djani 2
description: Racing Djani 2 is a racing genre game. It consists of 150 levels with 6 amazing different themes. It is a 2D game with 30 new cars and different backgrounds Candy, Lava, Jungle, and Ancient. Test your skills that how fast you run away, you will earn more and more by covering distances, and you can unlock new cars!

name: Synth Swinger
description: Will you find the end?

name: Black Gold: Wild West Story
description: Join the early 20th century oil boom! In this game you will hire people, build your own oil field, extract crude oil, fight obstacles and crises what eventually will bring you fortune you’ve never dreamt of!

name: The Hell Hives
description: Classic FPS style game with modern graphics. Fight through a series of highly challenging levels in a variety of environments. Take on many types of enemies with your shotgun, assault rifle, grenade launcher & nuke launcher. Solve puzzles, race rising lava, decipher codes and activate portals.

name: Square vs Triangles
description: Square vs Triangles is a old school 2D platformer with a minimalistic and beautiful art style and challenging gameplay mechanics inspired by 90's classics.

name: The Outpost
description: Six robots have crash-landed on a beach on a distant planet and they have one job to do: chill out and socialize while they wait for help to arrive. Visit the far reaches of space in this new Social VR experience where each participant controls a unique procedurally generated robot avatar.

name: Virtuous Western
description: Virtuous Western is a strategy game located in the old west, where our protagonist must eliminate all enemies in the area, using a limited amount of bullets to recover your stolen horse.

name: Lelie Navigation!
description: A turn-based RPG where you play as Lelie, a woman who uses the power of Dowsing to help people find things they've lost. One day however, Lelie's power gets her and her friend into a dangerous situation that they must work together to overcome.

name: Project Mirror
description: Welcome to Project Mirror, a mind-bending action puzzle game. Take control of both yourself and your mirror image as you strive to solve increasingly difficult puzzles that will test your cunning, intellect and skill. Putting your reflection in harm's way could lead to failure...

name: Forgotten Fragments
description:
Help Enid, Ryder and Dayen recover the Forgotten Fragments in this beautiful pixel art adventure, where your puzzle-platformer skills will be put to the test!

Uncover all the mysteries in this Forgotten realm.

name: Fast Wings
description: But now, thanks to Fast Wings, you have this opportunity. This bird simulator with a third-person view allows you to see the stormy forest river in all its glory, but follow the path of the rings, be careful! At high speed, it is easy to crash into a branch and leave the feathered body...

name: Tiddy Bounce
description: Welcome to Tiddy Bounce! Tiddy Bounce is a classic platformer with everyone's favorite, bouncing tiddies! The levels scroll forever, so you have infinite tiddies!

name: Lost Ed
description: Lost Ed is a game to bring a sense of nostalgia to old games. It does not contribute to innovative mechanics, but tries to offer a gaming experience from the 80s and 90s.

name: The Haunted Tunnel
description: The Haunted Tunnel is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror Game based on the story of the Haunted Subway tunnel located in Ohio.

name: The Tree
description: Grow an emblematic tree in each different world inspired by popular folklore. Each player has a certain number of parts to grow the tree and the first one to place them wins. Each player has cards and guardian spirits to help them grow the tree faster or slow down the growth of their opponents'. It is important to use them at the right time and correctly!

name: Lost Gold
description: Lost Gold is a 2D platformer where you need to work hard to kill enemies and find hidden gold. Each level cannot be repeated in its own way, collect gold and carry it to the cart as soon as possible. Do not forget that along the way you need to clear the levels from enemies.

name: Electronic Super Joy: Bonus Content Pack!
description: This DLC contains the soundtrack (Parts 1 & 2), an all new, giant HD digital version of the Electronic Super Joy Poster, and new bonus levels 'Thin Ice' & 'Treacherous Footing', each with a new world theme!

name: Pon Para and the Great Southern Labyrinth: Love and Shadows
description: When the gods of your parents come to claim you, unlock the ability to select a third option, the goddess Amiria, and unlock a whole new set of gifts in your quest to save reality from the dark god of destruction!

name: The Fang
description: A daring wanderer wields his weapons in real-time battles through his quest into the unknown.

name: 007: Quantum of Solace
description: The PlayStation 2 version of the game is an over-the-shoulder third-person shooter, much like 007: Everything or Nothing. This version excludes missions such as "Miami Airport" and "Train", but it adds missions such as "Docks", the Port-au-Prince part of the movie.

name: Flying Frags World Tour
description: Robots have torn open a portal to invade earth, everyone has mysteriously disappeared, the world has begun to tear apart. Sprint across the skies of robot-invaded Earth as you try to end the invasion.

name: These Nights Alone
description: Follow Alice during the investigation about her husband

name: Secrets of a Campfire
description: Escaping isn't always a bad thing. Sometimes a timeout is all it takes to get back your peace of mind. That's why I'm here. To take a walk, row a boat, light up a campfire and write about stuff and all I need you to do is just read my letters.

name: Francisca 2
description: Francisca 2 – a first-person indie horror game. Every day you’ll have to survive in your own house. At the start of each level, you need to place video cameras inside the house and in the yard and conceal yourself as well as you can, because a ghost girl is going to visit you soon.

name: Man of the World
description: Role-playing game in an open world. Battles, music, love, war, trade, ships, mysticism, new and old lands, travel, ranks of mercenaries, slaves and friendship. All this awaits you in this game. A game with new possibilities for you.

name: Tank Side Story
description: Tank Side Story is an homage to a great handheld tactical game series, thrusting its legacy and aesthetic into modern, competitive gameplay. Outmaneuver your opponent using classic military tactics on a grid with a flair for the dramatic.

name: Super Space Towers
description: Super Space Towers is a space 3D physics puzzle action game. You have been tasked with cleaning up the mess left by the aliens' attempts to sabotage the orbital power towers.Contain the orbs, rescue the stranded workers & escape the towers!

name: Angel Made
description: Athos & Destiny are pulled into war and must fight for justice. (Single Player RPG)

name: Automobilista: Legendary Tracks Part 2 - Adelaide
description: The famous Adelaide street circuit is now available in two versions: the longer historical layout of 1988 which hosted the Australian GP from 1985 to 1995, the new modern version along with its Supertruck variant.

name: 007: Quantum of Solace
description: The DS version of the game is drastically different from its console counterparts. The game is played with the DS sideways and as such is not a first person shooter. Actions (such as firing a weapon) are done by pressing icons on the touchscreen, while the DS's buttons are relegated to primarily initiating hand-to-hand combat. Bond's movements are controlled in a similar fashion to The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass, where the player drags the stylus around the touchscreen.

name: Pill Puzzle
description: In Pill Puzzle, you need to fit the right pills in the pill pack to be delivered to your customers.

name: Bacuri
description: Plunge into Bacuri's journey. Discovering himself, friends, habilities, lands, challenges and enemies. Draft your own path in this 2D platformer crafted in modern pixel art style.

name: Trench Simulator
description: Trench Simulator is a 50 vs 50 Online World War 1 Third Person Shooter simulator. Packed with authentic weaponry, vehicles , beautifully designed trenches and stationary weapons, Trench Simulator aims to recreate the epic charges across No Man's Land you often see in World War 1 footage.

name: DRazor
description: Defend the energy planet from the orbs. An easy to play but difficult to master casual game.

name: The Zombie's Horror
description: Warning! This is not a game for the faint-hearted.Everything you can imagine will turn into a Zombie's nightmare, The zombies have kidnaped you while you slept, Do you think you can pass all the missions and escape from the forest in a total darkness??

name: Lingering Legacy
description: The Dark God has ravaged the lands against his brother, letting his demons wage war through the once peaceful world. As the Guardian, you travel the land, purging the foul stain of the demons while in pursuit of the Fallen Guardian to restore balance once again.

name: Underground Garage
description: Become a mechanic in the world of illegal street racing. Buy used cars, repair and sell for a profit. Work on 20+ types of car. Develop a workshop and attract even more customers. Promote your cars online and sell greater numbers. There are also lots of available parts to use.

name: Hunter of the Disowned
description: Hunter Of The Disowned is a procedural dungeon adventure video game in which you embody a tragic hero who must fight against destiny in a world ruled by Gods of nature an slaved animals.

name: Solitaire Halloween Story
description: Trick or treat? No tricks! 120 unique levels await you in Solitaire Halloween Story

name: The World of Kungfu: Dragon and Eagle
description: A nostalgic pixel RPG that tells a Wuxia fantasy set in ancient China. You will start as a no-name wayfarer in a world of Kungfu, acquaint yourself with journeymen from feuding clans and sects, learn different schools of martial arts, and eventually make your own name at the crossroads of times.

name: Dragon VR
description: See the dragon at arm's length, ride on its back, feel the speed of the flight and hear the flapping of dragon’s wings! All these sensations can become real in Dragon VR game.

name: Retro Wars
description: Take on an entire army in this 80s inspired retro top down vertical scrolling shooter. Be a one man war machine or take a friend into battle for some fun 2 player local co-op.

name: Train Simulator 2021: SD70 V2 Volume 2 Loco Add-On
description: The SD70 Volume 2 add-on includes SD70 ACe, SD70MAC and SD70M-2 versions of this modern US freight hauler for Train Simulator 2021.

name: Cube Crisis
description: "Cube Crisis" is a casual competitive game, only with SUPER control can you last longer!

name: Pirate Jigsaw
description: Want a romantic sea cruise or a real pirate adventure? You can find it all in 500 photos in the new Pirate Jigsaw!

name: Wars Across the World: Carrhae 53
description: Carrhae 53 BC, the worst Roman defeat in the East. The Legions of the wealth and ambitious Crassus must march onto Seleucia, the civil war ridden capital of the Parthians, with unreliable allies at their sides.

name: Robin Morningwood Adventure: A Gay RPG
description: Robin Morningwood Adventure is a gay (bara) RPG video game where you play an adventurer, discovering Whellcum, a gay village.

name: Hentai Waifu 101
description: A shooter game with glute and breast physics!

name: Zaccaria Pinball: Shooting the Rapids 2016 Table
description: Shooting The Rapids 2016 Table is an Indian themed pinball table.

name: The Terrible Old Man: Collector's Edition
description: This Collector's Edition includes a "Making of" document with previously unseen art, the full soundtrack and the original gamejam version of The Terrible Old Man.

name: Mad Bus
